preconditions.precondition: The Admin has access to the advertisement list

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view the list of advertisements
List of advertisements view displays the advertisement list to the Admin
Admin clicks on the edit button of an advertisement
Redirected to the edit advertisement page
Edit advertisement page shows the content of the advertisement
Admin edits the advertisement data and clicks the save button
Edit advertisement view sends the information to AdsController
AdsController saves the data in AdsModel
AdsModel returns the saved data to AdsController
AdsController returns the result of saving the advertisement to the edit advertisement view
Edit advertisement view displays the edited advertisement to the Admin
